points: 日本語を一年半ぐらい勉強しています。好きです。— I've been studying Japanese for about a year and a half. I like it!
I'm currently working on a TD game using Godot! I got to play with flow fields and multithreading.
I'm not good at it, but I like to fool around with music.

header: When it's not the three above, these are usually next:
points: Udemy has lots of tech content; sometimes I'll spend my time learning there.
Occasionally, I'll be looking at XSS and and learning how to play capture the flags.
I'm not good at it, but I like to fool around with music.
Attended Canadian University Software Engineering Conference (CUSEC) 2020.
Helped a friend program a custom keyboard PCB using ATmega32u4 microcontroller.
